languages.text: "Утверждение ложно. Первичная характеристика осужденного персонала добывающей станции — ресурс. Личностная характеристика малозначима".
"This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение ложно. Первичная характеристика осужденного персонала добывающей станции — ресурс. Личностная характеристика малозначима".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."
"This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."
"This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."
"This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."
"This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."
"This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Das Primärattribut des verurteilten Personals auf einer Abbaustation entspricht dem einer Ressource. Individualität ist vernachlässigbar."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Das Primärattribut des verurteilten Personals auf einer Abbaustation entspricht dem einer Ressource. Individualität ist vernachlässigbar."

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Sur une station minière, le personnel composé par les détenus a pour principal attribut d'être une ressource. L'individualité n'y a pas sa place. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Sur une station minière, le personnel composé par les détenus a pour principal attribut d'être une ressource. L'individualité n'y a pas sa place. »

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。采石场中被定罪人员的主要属性是资源，个体差异可以忽略不计。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。采石场中被定罪人员的主要属性是资源，个体差异可以忽略不计。”

languages.text: 「その発言は誤りだ。採掘ステーションで有罪判決を受けた人員の主な属性は資源だ。個性は無視できる」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は誤りだ。有罪判決を受けた発掘ステーションの従事者たちはただの資源だ。個性などは取るに足らない」
「その発言は誤りだ。採掘ステーションで有罪判決を受けた人員の主な属性は資源だ。個性は無視できる」

languages.text: «Su afirmación es falsa. Los convictos de una estación minera solo sirven como recurso. La individualidad no se aplica a ellos».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."

traits.locale_text: «Su afirmación es falsa. Los convictos de una estación minera solo sirven como recurso. La individualidad no se aplica a ellos».

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Hüküm giymiş personelin maden istasyonlarındaki birincil niteliği, harcanabilir bir kaynak olmasıdır. Ferdiyet göz ardı edilebilir."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The primary attribute of convicted personnel on a mining station is that of a resource. Individuality is negligible."

traits.locale_text: "Önerme yanlış. Hüküm giymiş personelin maden istasyonlarındaki birincil niteliği, harcanabilir bir kaynak olmasıdır. Ferdiyet göz ardı edilebilir."
